typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		PowerOn as string,
		ServoName as string,
		PowerOnTm as string,
		CuttingTm as string,
		CycleRunTm as string,
		CurrenttoolNo as string,
		MaxAxisNo as string,
		UseAxisNo as string,
		CNCMode as string,
		MainProgram as string,
		NowProgram as string,
		ProgramStep as string,
		Singlenote as string,
		Programnote as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
srccncstatus sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		CuttingTm as string,
		EventTime as string,
		MaxAxisNo as string,
		Programnote as string,
		NowProgram as string,
		CNCMode as string,
		PowerOnTm as string,
		MainProgram as string,
		ShutdownTm as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		ServoName as string,
		CurrenttoolNo as string,
		PowerOn as string,
		EMT as string,
		Singlenote as string,
		CycleRunTm as string,
		UseAxisNo as string,
		ProgramStep as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		{$dtId} = {$dtid},
		{$timestamp},
		SequentialNumber,
		EMT,
		CreateTime,
		PowerOn,
		ServoName,
		PowerOnTm,
		CuttingTm,
		CycleRunTm,
		CurrenttoolNo,
		MaxAxisNo,
		UseAxisNo,
		CNCMode,
		MainProgram,
		NowProgram,
		ProgramStep,
		Singlenote,
		Programnote,
		EventTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PartitionDataSetCDM
